TopicTitle: State of Affairs of the KSPSA

Articles.Content:
Feed: https://twitter.com/KSP_SpaceAgency

 

Welcome, one and all, to the KSPSA! The Kerbal Space Program Space Agency(the name is redundant in case one word explodes or breaks off) plans to launch satellites, deflect asteroids and generally blow stuff up. Mission reports and general state of affair news will go here.

Edited December 25, 2015 by TotallyNotSatan
